name: OCP Society Honours Dr Christine Chaillot â€“ the world renowned pan-orthodox activist with the first ever Defender of Orthodoxy Award

desc.html: OCP Society honored Christine Chaillot with the first ever Defender of Orthodoxy Award in a humble and private event held at Kottayam on 16th of September 2014. The Award has been constituted by the OCP Foundation. Dr Christine was choose for the award for her outstanding contribution in the field of Pan-Orthodox dialogue, particularity between the Eastern and Oriental Orthodox Churches.
